TopicTitle: I'm not going to lie to you...

Articles.Content: Yesterday I saw a green tow truck, and it's license plate was 'KSP-0327'. Unfortunately it sped up quickly after I noticed the license plate, so I couldn't inspect it further. It's true -- Kerbals are secretly slowly worming their way to the real world!
Along with Kerbel green tea, and a construction company called Kerman

Along with Kerbel green tea, and a construction company called Kerman

I pity the fool who hires that construction company.
Have you seen the VAB? I don't think they're all that bad.

Have you seen the VAB? I don't think they're all that bad.

Have you seen the drivers in the SPH?
